title: Guide to Challenger for Kallista mains
body:
* Navigate to your Config folder in the League of Legends directory.
* Open input.cfg
* Paste the following: 

> [HUDEvents]   
evtOnUIMouse1 = [Button 1], [Button 3]   
evtOnUIMouse2 = [Button 2]   
evntHudMoveableSelect = [Button 3] 
evtPlayerAttackMove=[]  
[GameEvents]
evtPlayerAttackMoveClick=[Button 1]  
evtPlayerSelectClick = [Button 3]   
evtOnUIMouse4Pan=[]
